main.name: Ryan DeCoster
main.description: I am an engineer with  a passion for creating products that will excite and delight the user. With over 6 years experience as a product developer, and project manager with other experiences in research, and quality.I have spent most of my career looking for innovative solutions to complex problems to benefit the consume

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Ryan DeCoster must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
